interface.label: Which role are you applying for? (D)
Which country do you live in? (F)
Would you have the right to a Visa for the job location, if required? (G)
Please describe your top 5 skills that make you suitable for this job. Separate your skills with a comma. (H)

mapper.html:
Dear {{2.`4`}}, 

We regret to inform you that your application for the post of {{2.`1`}} has been unsuccessful.

Unfortunately, we did not feel that your skills quite matched what we were looking for.

If you see a future opening, more in line with your skillset, by all means, please re-apply with us using our Sakura chatbot. 

Thanks for your time and consideration, and all the best for the future.

Team Sakura
mapper.subject: Your application with Team Sakura
